definition: Khamenei, Ayatollah Aly (1939-), Supreme Leader of Iran, aka Ali Khamenei
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)

sentences.english: Shahroudi is reportedly very close to Iran's top leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenai.
sentences.chinese: 据报导，沙赫鲁迪同伊朗最高领袖哈梅内伊私交甚好。

sentences.english: Khamenei has called the MKO "America's servants."
sentences.chinese: 哈梅内伊将MKO称之为“美国的走狗”。

definition: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad (1956-), Iranian fundamentalist politician, president of Iran 2005-2013/abbr. for 艾哈邁迪內賈德|艾哈迈迪内贾德
Erdogan (name)/Recep Tayyip Erdoğan (1954-), Turkish politician, prime minister from 2003

pinyin: Ba1 le4 si1 tan3 Min2 zu2 Quan2 li4 Ji1 gou4
related.word: 巴勒斯坦民族权力机构

definition: Maliki or Al-Maliki (name)/Nouri Kamel al-Maliki (1950-) prime minister of Iraq from 2006

pinyin: Sa4 da2 mu3 · Hou2 sai4 yin1

definition: Mohammed Abdel Rahman Abdel Raouf Arafat al-Qudwa al-Husseini (1929-2004), Palestinian leader, popularly known as Yasser Arafat 亞西爾·阿拉法特|亚西尔·阿拉法特[Ya4 xi1 er3 · A1 la1 fa3 te4]
Pervez Musharraf (1943-), Pakistani general and politician, president 2001-2008
